name: Creamy Tuna Noodle Casserole From Scratch
author: Annette
summary: This easy tuna noodle casserole from scratch is made with cream cheese and Gruyere. You can use any small pasta instead of farfalle like penne, rigatoni, etc.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can chunk tuna in water, drained and flaked
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Grease a baking dish with butter
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook farfalle pasta at a boil, stirring occasionally, until halfway cooked, about 7 minutes
Drain and rinse under cold water
Stir together sour cream, cream cheese, and milk in a large bowl until smooth
Mix in tuna, green onion, and red bell pepper
Season with a little salt and pepper
Fold in cooked farfalle and pour into the prepared baking dish
Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted and lightly browned, about 25 minutes
